metadata.title: USN-5795-1 -- Net-SNMP vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Net-SNMP incorrectly handled certain requests. A remote attacker could possibly use these issues to cause Net-SNMP to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5795-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  snmptrapd - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 libsnmp30 - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 libsnmp-dev - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 libsnmp-base - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 snmp - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 libsnmp-perl - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 tkmib - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 snmpd - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 python-netsnmp - 5.7.3+dfsg-1.8ubuntu3.8 No subscription required
